title: Las Vegas Desert Dogs
summary: The Las Vegas Desert Dogs are a planned box lacrosse team in the National Lacrosse League. They will play at Michelob Ultra Arena in Paradise, Nevada starting in the 2022–2023 season.
content:
The Las Vegas Desert Dogs are a planned box lacrosse team in the National Lacrosse League. They will play at Michelob Ultra Arena in Paradise, Nevada starting in the 2022–2023 season.


== History ==
On June 21, 2021, the NLL awarded an expansion franchise to the city of Las Vegas and co-owners Joseph Tsai, Wayne Gretzky, Steve Nash and Dustin Johnson. The team will begin play in the 2022–2023 season beginning in fall 2022 with its home arena being Michelob Ultra Arena.
